CustomField.description: Used by NCP_Product2TriggerHandler (and tested by NCP_Product2TriggerHandler_Test) - please review class before changing this, to ensure test is not breaking
CustomField.formula: AND(NOT(ISBLANK(NCP_CAREACTIVATE__c)), CASE(TEXT(NokiaCPQ_State__c),'Obsolete','FALSE','Rejected','FALSE','TRUE')=='TRUE', CASE(UPPER(PMD_Product_Item_Type__c), 'DESIGN ITEM','TRUE', 'SERVICE DESIGN ITEM','TRUE', 'COMPLEMENTARY ITEM','TRUE', 'NSN SERVICE DESIGN ITEM','TRUE', 'NSN SOLUTION','TRUE', 'SOLUTION','TRUE', 'FALSE')=='TRUE')
CustomField.label: createStdPriceBookEntry
